tool_description:
Youtube Tutorial of API showing the latest climate change news from the New York Times and The Guardian

Originally Created by ANIA KUBOW
name: climate change API Demo
title: climate change API Demo

api_list.name: Individual News Sources
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-api-demo.p.rapidapi.com/news/theguardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-api-demo.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-api-demo.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-api-demo.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Climate Change News
api_list.description: This endpoint returns back all news about Climate Change from multiple news sources around the world.
